contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 1979 D Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section C)
Oxfordshire & District Brass Band Association Entertainment Contest (Section C) 40 Entertainments Contest Oxfordshire & District BBA Entertainment Contest oxfordshire-district-brass-band-association-entert
Abbey Hall, Abingdon, Oxfordshire, England, UK The programme lists four adjudicators, two of which seem likely for music, two for presentation. They are, as listed in the programme, Capt. M. G. Lane, Ian Morrish, Simon Park and Major F. R. Sillitoe. If you know who adjudicated which section, please let us know.
Presentation: 1 Stantonbury Brass 2 Jubilee Brass 3 City of Oxford Training
British Bandsman 26/05/1979 shows result of this section as Stantonbury 87, Jubilee 82, City of Oxford Training 80. Deportment won by Jubilee.
Feb. 2, 2013, 10:55 a.m. April 16, 2015, 8:56 p.m.
1 Jubilee Brass (Oxford) Ken Membury
2 Oxford Templars Brass G. Webb
3 East Woodhay Silver Des Webb
Unknown Result Stonesfield Silver Band Jack Nunn
Unknown Result Olney Brass Malcolm Holloway
